name: Bumya Play Or Dead
description:
Visit the school that was closed 27 years ago and solve its mysteries dodge the monsters can you survive find 10 keys but there is a problem there is presence in the school escape from it and be careful to find the keys The only danger is not the room, you have to pass all the levels, which means a lot of monsters stay tuned, goodbye 

Note: Windows 11 and Windows 10 and 10 GB  the optimization is a bit bad so don't give a point

Chapter 2 Coming soon  follow game PC and Android
